div.h2: Welcome to Elmwood Village Charter Schools
A vibrant school community currently meeting the academic and social needs of 700 students in the city of Buffalo—and consistently among the highest performing schools in Western New York.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row section vc_row-fluid vc_inner gray-bg grid_section

p.strong: EVCS is closed through through May 15th, 2020. Please check your email often, as our leadership team and teachers are communicating regularly via email, text, and social media. We are wishing everyone in our community a safe and healthy time away from school. Please stay in touch with questions and concerns.

div.p: Thank you for your understanding as we continue to keep health and safety as our top priority.
Kathy Jamil and Danielle Bruno, Principals

EVCS is a public school of choice, and no tuition or fees are required for attendance. EVCS does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, native language, disability, or gender.
Our community’s health and safety is our top priority. Please visit the health section of our web site to find guidelines on when a child will be sent home and when to keep a sick child home.
Our schools are closed until re-opening is deemed safe.
The following links from will provide the best and most up-to-date factual information:
What is Novel Coronavirus and related questions: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html
Erie County Dept. of Health COVID-19 page: http://www2.erie.gov/health/coronavirus
Reliable, useful information is the best antidote to anxiety that can arise when misinformation and hype are being spread.
Find helpful information for you and your students on school menus, school supplies, health forms and requirements, and other information relating to daily life at Elmwood Village Charter Schools.
